Reviews.Content: arrived rome reservation hotel airport conveniently located top spanish steps lift metro station top expected hotel 3 star hotels europe smelled shower tiny mildew towels stained im glad reservation night available nights couldnt stayed

Reviews.Title: “Great Location - Friendly Staff - Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: julijuls715
Reviews.Content: clean safe comfortable hotel absolutely location staff wonderfully gracious helpful professional friendly quaint maintained nice understand negative reviews am seeing maybe expecting super fancy dont fine dont spend thousands dollars trip sit hotel perfect sleep night spend day seeing wonderful sites rome close spanish steps helpful finding landmark hotel nice selection breakfast definitely stay
